feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.138.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add request ID to error logs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3990
  • fix: yaml secret file parsing by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3837
  • add index for referencing columns in identity access token by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3989
  • feat: add more server admin environment overrides by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3995
  • ENG-2595 Added Railway secret sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3976
  • feat(dynamic-secrets): AWS IRSA auth method by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3930
  • improvement(audit-logs): clarify secret key/path filter behavior for audit logs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3982
  • Fix folder creation commits triggered on new folder instead of the parent by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3998
  • fix(secret-scanning-v2): Remove Jim as sole author of all secret leaks by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4000
  • improvement(frontend): Server admin sidebar improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4001
  • Allow docs to run fully offline by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4003
  • fix(approval-policies): improve policies handling by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3923
  • fix(approval-workflows): allow null committer on secret approval request and cascade delete on access request by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3997
  • feat(secret-sync): Cloudflare Workers by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3988
  • improvement(frontend): Move sso/provision settings back to org settings tabs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4007
  • improvement(frontend): use secret path input for create policy modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4002
  • feat: migrate github app connection to env override by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4004
  • Use non root user for docs Dockerfile by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4008
  • improvement(frontend): make empty value circle display on overview page yellow by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4014
  • updated changelog by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4093
  • docs: cpp sdk by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4095
  • feat: validate db schemas CI test by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4094
  • Fix authEnforced returning a token when org has authEnforced enabled by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4101
  • improvement(frontend): Make checkbox colors more apparent and fix specific priv. checkbox styling by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4013
  • improvement(frontend): Dynamic secrets doc links by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4015
  • Optimize token cleanup job by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4011
  • improvement(access-approval): allow all users to reject their own access requests by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4103
  • Make Azure DevOps sync not require project name by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4105
  • feat(fips): native FIPS support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3973
  • improvement(frontend): update styling/consistency for navbar by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4104
  • improvement(frontend): prevent organization name wrap in header by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4109
  • improvement(frontend): show upgrade modal and access banner for secret scanning config page when feature is disabled by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4110
  • feat: Checkly app connection and secrets sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4078
  • Add missing setting for postgres app connection by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4111
  • improvement(frontend): add merge/closed status badge to closed secret change request table by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4106
  • misc: re-added EST to PKI templates by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4112
  • Minor improvement on the Postgres docs changing a warning to a tip by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4115
  • fix: oci auth for go sdk by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4152
  • feat(#2938): Add supabase app connection and secrets sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4113
  • Add isEmailVerified to isUserCompleted flag on samlLogin by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4175
  • Make certificate collection required by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4176
  • fix: propogate Github app connection errors to the client properly by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4177
  • docs: document use of port 8433 for TLS certificate auth by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4180
  • improvement(access-requests): add access requests to single env view + general UI improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4178
  • fix: verify response type by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4182
  • On importCertToCa use serialNumber instead of dn to get the parentCa by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4185
  • Updated CLI export doc to document the new --output-file behavior by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4184

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.137.0-postgres...infisical/v0.138.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.139.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Throw when user does not have permission to read the referenced secret value by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4164
  • feat(ENG-3247): add auth origin domain cookie on token creation by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4187
  • fix: github radar app connection errors and clear aod cookie on signout by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4188
  • fix: render sync fns by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4196
  • improvements(frontend): Revise commit history and commit details UI by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4012
  • feat(app-connection): Gateway support for SQL App Connections + Secret Rotations by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4117
  • fix(fips): allow fips in dev mode without license by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4209
  • fix: bump aws arn field size by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4208
  • feat(app-connection, secret-rotation): Okta App Connection + Okta Client Secret Rotation by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4192
  • feat(secrets-ui): Improve SecretDashboard table to support multiple changes on a single commit by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3993
  • fix: Notify secret-scan results to the users by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4189
  • improvement(frontend): Revise and expand audit log date filter and page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4190
  • Daniel/rust sdk docs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4215
  • feat: Move products out of projects by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4207
  • Add Bitbucket Secret Sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4210
  • Redo confirm changes box by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4214
  • feat: Digital Ocean App connection and App Platform secret sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4203
  • fix: redis banner appears only when it is not configured by @dcs-soni in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4218
  • License check on fnGetGatewayClientTlsByGatewayId by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4201
  • fix: resolved project deletion not working for secret scanning on missing plan by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4222
  • Fix secret rotation defaults by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4224
  • feat: updated invalid url by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4225
  • improvements(frontend): org and project policy page ui improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4181
  • improvement(dashboard): add secret tag/metadata search functionality to single env view dashboard by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4199
  • feat(secret-reminders): rework secret reminders logic by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3926

New Contributors

  • @dcs-soni made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.138.0-postgres...infisical/v0.139.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.139.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: resolved oracle failing in app connection by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.139.0-postgres...infisical/v0.139.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.139.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • improvement(frontend): improve dashboard filter behavior and design by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4216
  • feat(machine-identity): Add AWS attributes for ABAC by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4227
  • feature(project-audit-logs): add project audit logs pages by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4228
  • improvement(frontend): Adjust select dropdown styling in add project modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4232
  • fix(frontend): correct org identity mutation table invalidation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4233
  • feat(external-migrations): vault migrations by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4211
  • Improve render retries and rate limits by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4235
  • Fix secret reminders migration job by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.139.1-postgres...infisical/v0.139.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.140.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • improvement(frontend): add col resize to secret dashboard env view by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4230
  • feat(secret-sync/render): auto redeploy on sync by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4242
  • Add client secrets authentication on Azure CS app connection by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4229
  • Add manual migration to secret imports rework by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4243
  • fix(fips): increased image size and migrations by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.139.2-postgres...infisical/v0.140.0-postgres
